title: Please.. Can we bring back Hextech Skins? Starting With Elise
body:
I'm a big fan of Hextech and I would love to see Elise in a Human form looking way

http://th04.deviantart.net/fs70/PRE/i/2014/126/a/3/skin_concept__hextech_elise_by_anodesu-d7hdrn1.jpg

http://fc02.deviantart.net/fs70/i/2014/230/3/f/hextech_elise_version_2_by_anodesu-d7vqs2d.jpg

Artist: http://anodesu.deviantart.com/

replies.body: I'm also a big fan of Hextech skins, and I think Elise has a lot of potential for something like this! I love the spiderlings in these concepts!
ditto, the spiderlings are super cool.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=RPnLdJpW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-03T20:11:55.756+0000)
>
> I'm also a big fan of Hextech skins, and I think Elise has a lot of potential for something like this! I love the spiderlings in these concepts!

would love if the spiderlings had their own sound where you can hear the glass or liquid. Even when Elise shoots her spider you hear a big glass explosion.
:o That would be super cool. I'd love to hear mechanical sounds when she used Rappel.

also picture her spider form, where you see steam come out! Similar to blitzcrank :o

And when she uses W in spider form, you hear a bubbling sound.... o:
Make dem spiders work.
If Hextech = Steampunk, then we need more Hextech skins.

I would enjoy a hextech Rumble.
What if Rumble decided to go to Heimer's school instead of rejecting him and calling him a traitor to yordles?

You could make her wear the glasses instead or perhaps give the glasses 2 extra 'circles' to make it seem like she has more eyes to be more spiderlike. Before that, please, fix her...
